*div1 type="summary"* *p*H. H. League to Austin, September 20, 1826. Immigration from Tennessee.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Iesh Bayuo*/location_mentioned* the *date_mentioned n="09-20-1826">20th Sept 1826*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*D sir it has been *date_mentioned n="08-23-1826">28 days*/date_mentioned* since we left *location_mentioned*San Felipe*/location_mentioned* and we have Came 235 Miles Our *person_mentioned*company */person_mentioned*was nearly all sick when we started and have been much worse on the Boad than they were before, we have lain hear about a week on account of the ill health of*person_mentioned* Mr Jn Robison*/person_mentioned* who has-been thought dangerous a part of the time but is no[w]Convelescent and thinks he will be able to Travil on *date_mentioned n="0-19-1826">tomorrow*/date_mentioned*, I Expect you learned from *person_mentioned*Mr McNeal*/person_mentioned* the circumstance of my geting crippled by a fall from a horse from which I have suffered Much and am not yet Recovered but have my health perfectly in all Other Respects. I have recived two letters from *location_mentioned*home */location_mentioned*since I left your *location_mentioned*town */location_mentioned*one from my *person_mentioned*wife */person_mentioned*dated *date_mentioned n="08-06-1826">6 August*/date_mentioned* which informed me that thare would be considerable Emigration from *location_mentioned*Tennessee */location_mentioned*to your *location_mentioned*Coloney */location_mentioned*this *date_mentioned n="Fall- 1826">fall*/date_mentioned*. I *date_mentioned n="9-20-1826">this morning*/date_mentioned* Recived another from *person_mentioned*william D Horton*/person_mentioned* my *person_mentioned*Brother in law*/person_mentioned* who Visited the *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*with me, you may perhaps Recollect I told you that he Rote to me from *location_mentioned*Nachitoches*/location_mentioned* on his Return that he had declined coming to the *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned*, he tells me in his presint communication that he was Very sick and low spirited at the time he rote and thought at that time he would not come but on Regaining his health he changed his notion he informs me that he has procured the Ten *person_mentioned*families */person_mentioned*that you granted me permition to Settle in your *location_mentioned*coloney */location_mentioned*as was agreed on between him and me before we parted and himself and them are all prepairing to come to the *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned*—on the first Rise of the *location_mentioned*River*/location_mentioned*, he also informs me that my *person_mentioned*Father in law*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Doctor Porter*/person_mentioned* a *person_mentioned*brother in law*/person_mentioned* together with a considerable number of *person_mentioned*Gentlemen */person_mentioned*from the Vicinity of *location_mentioned*Nashville*/location_mentioned* will visit your *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*this *date_mentioned n="Winter-1826">winter*/date_mentioned*. Could I have known all this before I left *location_mentioned*San Felipe*/location_mentioned* I should not have went *location_mentioned*home */location_mentioned*at all for he informs me that he is prepairing to bring my *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*Out. and it would have been highly Important for me to have Remained and made preparations to Recive them as well as the other *person_mentioned*Emigrants*/person_mentioned*, but as I am On the way I will continue On and assist them in getting out as soon as possible. I wish you if it is possible to Reserve a *location_mentioned*League of land*/location_mentioned* for *person_mentioned*William D. Horton*/person_mentioned* on the *location_mentioned*Barnard */location_mentioned*or *location_mentioned*Bay Priarai*/location_mentioned* and if that can not be done as near as Possible to my *location_mentioned*League at *person_mentioned*Ginning*/person_mentioned*s o[ld?] camp on the Collorado River*/location_mentioned*, you will also confur on me a grate favour by paying some attention to the selecting and surveying the *location_mentioned*ten Leagues above the Labaha Road*/location_mentioned* as it is likely my *person_mentioned*settlers*/person_mentioned* will wish to go on Immediately, and above all I wish you without fail to write to me at *location_mentioned*Nashville */location_mentioned*On the subject of Slavery and the provisions of the constitution generally. I shall in a few days leave the *person_mentioned*company */person_mentioned*and go on to *location_mentioned*Nashville */location_mentioned*as Speedily as possible and it would be a matter of the highest importance to Recive a Communication from you as soon as I get *location_mentioned*home */location_mentioned*for should slavery be abolished it would produce some Change in my seletion of *person_mentioned*Emigrants */person_mentioned*I shall be at a loss in my arrangements until I heare from [you]. Give my Respects to *person_mentioned*Majr Burn[e]t*/person_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Mr Williams*/person_mentioned* etc*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*H. H. League*/person_mentioned**/p* */div1*
